title: News Briefs 24-01-2022
cleaned_text:
• 2022 could be a turning point in the study of UFOs.
• Dark matter asteroids (if they exist) may cause solar flares.
• ‘My out-of-body experience: In a sensory deprivation tank, I lost my body and found myself.’
• Nocebo responses explain up to 76% of COVID vaccine side effects.
• The moon that resembles the Death Star has been hiding another epic secret.
• Scientists discover black hole that’s creating stars instead of devouring them.
• Animals respond to death in many ways. Mourning might be one of them.
• Ancient burials reveal the depths of humans’ love for beer.
• In 2010, Nicolas Cage purchased two plots in a New Orleans cemetery, and used one to construct this strange pyramid mausoleum.

Thanks to Alan V. M. for your support of the Grail!

Quote of the Day:

If the Lord Almighty had consulted me before embarking upon Creation, I should have recommended something simpler.
